document.title: Debugger Preferences
document.paragraph:
This category contains preferences that are specific to the EiffelStudio Debugger and the debugger tool. These preferences are:
1
Label in the preferences window Complete Description
Width Width of debug tool
Height Height of debug tool
Last saved stack path Disk location of last saved stack path information.
Interrupt every n instructions
Debug output evaluation Display DEBUG_OUTPUT.debug_output value.
Generating type evaluation Display ANY.generating_type value.
Min slice Smallest number of items displayed in list data.
Max slice Largest number of items displayed in list data.
Main splitter position Position of main horizontal splitter bar.
Proportion Proportion of left side of debug tool
Default maximum stack depth Default size of maximum stack depth.
Default displayed string size Default size of string (in characters) displayed in debug mode.
Left debug layout Items/tools shown in navigation layout when in debug mode.
Right debug layout Items/tools shown on editor side when in debug mode.
Dotnet debugger Which .NET debugger to launch.
